amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which exempts certain naval facilities from adhering to the water quality standards in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 60 in the Congressional Record of May 10, 1995) to delete language in the bill to exempt certain Naval facilities from adhering to the water quality standards in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 294 (Roll no. 321).
